definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The computer network project, maintains the service, the technical backstopping .
sentences.chinese: 電腦網絡工程，維護維修，技術支援。

sentences.english: Nato says it's investigating how its computer network was hacked.
sentences.chinese: 北約稱其正在調查電腦網絡遭遇襲擊事件。

sentences.english: Every student will have a computer at home an inter-planet computer network.
sentences.chinese: 每個學生家裏將會有一臺電腦並與星際電腦網絡連接。

sentences.english: I am responsible for computer knowledge training and the maintenance of computer network.
sentences.chinese: 我負責電腦知識培訓和電腦網絡維護。
